A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Went in thinking I'd love it after being told that the backlash was of the 'disgruntled-why-are-there-ghostbuster-ladies' type but I simply can't stress enough how that line of lazy/manipulative reporting is misrepresenting fan criticism. If anything audiences have been far too kind. It isn't just a bad movie. It's fucking insulting to anyone with even half a brain.
